name: 8ball
description: Magic 8-Ball

options.name: text
options.description: Whatever input you wish to ask, this field doesn't matter, it's not taken into account

name: add-money
description: Adds money to a pinged user

options.name: user
options.description: The user to give money to

options.name: amount
options.description: The amount of money to give

name: amogus
description: among us haha impostor sus! joins vc if the message author is in one and plays among us drip theme

name: blackjack
description: Plays a game of classic blackjack, the decks are made possible by deckofcardsapi.com

options.name: amount
options.description: The amount you want to bet

name: blacklist
description: Blacklists a member from using NodeBot commands

options.name: add
options.description: Add a member to the blacklist

options.name: user
options.description: The user you want to blacklist

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason you want to blacklist the user

options.name: remove
options.description: Remove a member from the blacklist

options.name: user
options.description: The user you want to remove from the blacklist

options.name: list
options.description: The list of blacklisted members

options.name: page
options.description: The page you want to see

examples: blacklist add @johndoe#0001 why r u gae

name: bot-stats
description: Returns stats about the bot: server, member, and emoji count

name: bs
description: Damn, some bs that we have to stare at. Contains sensitive language

name: crime
description: You commit a crime and either get money or lose money. Can contain sensitive language

name: csgo
description: Returns CS:GO stats about a player. Use the Steam ID, and the profile must be public for it to work

options.name: id
options.description: The Steam ID, the last part of the URL when looking at a steam profile

name: deposit
description: Deposits money from your cash into your bank

options.name: amount
options.description: The amount you want to deposit into your bank

name: dice
description: Bet on a dice roll

options.name: amount
options.description: The amount you want to bet

options.name: number
options.description: The side you want to bet on

options.name: number2
options.description: Optionally choose another side, receive double the money if you win, or lose the amount you bet

name: economy-leaderboard
description: Displays the economy leaderboard of the guild

name: give-money
description: Gives money to another use from your own bank

options.name: user
options.description: The user you want to give money to

options.name: amount
options.description: The amount you want to give

name: help
description: Shows all available commands, or information about a specified command

options.name: command
options.description: A specific command to get inforamation about

name: invite
description: Sends the invite link

name: kick
description: Kicks a user from the server

options.name: user
options.description: The desired user to be kicked

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason for the kick

examples: kick @whyamistillherejusttosuffer#1111 reason reason reason reason sample text

name: leave
description: Leaves the voice channel

name: loop
description: Loops the current video

name: lorem
description: Spits out some lorem ipsum text

name: mc
description: Returns information about a Minecraft Server

options.name: ip
options.description: The IP of the Minecraft Server

options.name: port
options.description: The port of the Minecraft Server

name: meme
description: Returns a meme, either from r/dankmemes or the local memes folder if requested

options.name: type
options.description: The amount of memes to be sent, or to send a meme from the local memes folder

name: memer
description: Meme image manipulation powered by the memer-api module

options.name: format
options.description: The format/template of the meme

options.name: input
options.description: The text to be sent, or the URL

name: pause
description: Pauses the current video

name: ping
description: Sends a pong back with the bot's current average response time

name: play
description: Plays a requested video from Youtube

options.name: video
options.description: The video to play

name: poll
description: Creates a poll with the votes as reactions

options.name: title
options.description: The title of the poll

options.name: hours
options.description: The amount of hours this poll should last

options.name: field1
options.description: An option in the poll

options.name: field2
options.description: An option in the poll

options.name: field3
options.description: An option in the poll

options.name: field4
options.description: An option in the poll

examples: poll What Food Is Best?. 3. Pizza. Burger. Pasta. Other
poll Which is Better?. 24. Sleep. Friends
poll idk what to put anymore. 596.5. im bored. what are thooooooose

name: purge
description: Removes the latest messages by the requested amount

options.name: amount
options.description: The amount of messages to delete

name: qrcode
description: Takes some input and convert it into a QR code

options.name: input
options.description: The input you want to generate into a QR code

name: queue
description: Gets the queue

name: remove
description: Removes a video from the queue

options.name: index
options.description: The video to remove, use the number above the video as the video to remove

name: remove-money
description: Removes money from a pinged user

options.name: user
options.description: The user to remove money from

options.name: amount
options.description: The amount of money to remove from the bank

name: resume
description: Resumes the current video

name: rickroll
description: commits rick roll. joins vc if the message author is in one and plays rick roll

name: rps
description: Plays a game of Rock Paper Scissors

name: say
description: Makes the bot say what you type

options.name: text
options.description: The stuff you want to say

examples: say i ran out of examples very quickly

name: skip
description: Skips the current video

name: slot-machine
description: Spins a slot machine

options.name: amount
options.description: The amount of money you want to bet

name: spotify
description: Returns information about a song on Spotify

options.name: artist
options.description: The artist of the song

options.name: title
options.description: The title of the song

name: stats
description: Returns stats about your current economy

name: support
description: Sends the support server link

name: ttt
description: Tic Tac Toe game made possible with the discord-tictactoe NPM package

options.name: user
options.description: The user you want to battle against

name: unloop
description: Unloops the current video

name: unpause
description: Unpauses the current video

name: urban
description: Returns the urban definition of a word

options.name: word
options.description: The word you want to get the definiton of

name: users
description: Get the amount of users in the discord server excluding bots

options.name: role
options.description: The amount of users with this role that aren't bots

name: volume
description: Changes the volume of the bot

options.name: volume
options.description: The volume to change it to

name: weather
description: Gives information about the weather in a city

options.name: city
options.description: The city's weather

name: withdraw
description: Withdraw money from your bank

options.name: amount
options.description: The amount you want to withdraw

name: work
description: Effortlessly earn some money

name: ytsearch
description: Searches for a video on youtube and returns the first result

options.name: query
options.description: The video you want to search for
